name: Astraaal
summary:
This is about skydiving from space. Following the jump of Red Bull Baumgartner©, people wanted to try for themselves. But they didn't have the cyborg brain of Red Bull Baumgartner©, and the speed and lack of oxygen turned them into shit. 
 
It's a game for 1 to 4 players. It's recommended to play with two keyboards to avoid key ghosting (spooky~). 
 
Art by dziff - http://www.dziff.com/ 
 
Music by Badabing & Lectronice 
 
Made for a TIGsource compo
